verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%>

to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

It <S%H1961>came<s%> also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8552>end<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1540>exile<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2962>"Before<s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> you in the <S%H990>womb<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you, And <S%H2962>before<s%> you were <S%H3318>born<s%> <S%H7358><s%> I <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> you; I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> you a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>"

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Alas,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H1696>speak,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I am a <S%H5288>youth.<s%>"

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do not <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I am a <S%H5288>youth,<s%>' <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H5921>everywhere<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> you, you shall <S%H1980>go,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
"Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them, For I am with you to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out His <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> To <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up and to <S%H5422>break<s%> <S%H5422>down,<s%> To destroy and to <S%H6>overthrow,<s%> To <S%H2040>build<s%> and to <S%H1129>plant.<s%>"

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> do you <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>rod<s%> of an <S%H8247>almond<s%> <S%H8247>tree.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> for I am <S%H8245>watching<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it."

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%>?" And I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>boiling<s%> <S%H5518>pot,<s%> <S%H6440>facing<s%> away from the <S%H6828>north.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> will <S%H6605>break<s%> <S%H6605>forth<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H7121>calling<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> "and they will <S%H935>come,<s%> and they will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"And I will <S%H1696>pronounce<s%> My <S%H4941>judgments<s%> on them <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9567>wickedness,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> Me and have <S%H6999>offered<s%> <S%H6999>sacrifices<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"Now, <S%H247>gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you. Do not be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H2865>dismay<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> as a <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and as a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> and as <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> to its <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
"And they will <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> you, but they will not <S%H3201>overcome<s%> you, for I am with you to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
